sentence.Network_en: Genetic effects include inheritable changes resulting from mutations in reproductive cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 遗传的影响包括再生细胞变异引起的遗传变化.

sentence.Network_en: Its features are normative, qualificative, operable, inheritable and changeable.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的特征是规范性 、 限定性 、 可操作性 、 传承性和变迁性.

sentence.Network_en: Indicates an ACL contains no inheritable components.
sentence.Network_cn: 表明acl未包含任何可承继的组件.

细胞质遗传(cytoplasmic inheritance)也称核外遗传（extranuclear inheritance) 是指由细胞质(核外)的遗传物质所控.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as enheritable): from Anglo-Norman French enheritable 'able to be made heir', from Old French enheriter (see inherit)
